body: Hi All, i'm trying to pull out an energy analysis of radTempMtx and when i run it it gives me "The calculation has been terminated by the user!" any solution ? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a0gZpI6iXII9c-FWvCKO5MXRp13rU4S4kfBH0eAlwCkt1VwLs7240AYamXBuBczLie73siLNHSVM9pQ6O2LzCaX5yeDCTMg*/Untitled1.jpg)
topic: The calculation has been terminated by the user!

replies.body:
Ataur,

This warning is usually meant to indicate that you hit "Esc" during the calculation (you can use "Esc" to cancel the calculation if you accidentally run a really long simulation).  However, in your case, it is likely because something is failing deeper in the code and the component just thinks that you hit esc.

Upload the GH file and I can take a look at what is actually going wrong.

-Chris

Hi Chris,

Did you manage to find a solution to this error? I just ran into the same issue trying to use saved SolarAdjustMRT data with the Outdoor Comfort calculator. I closed GH and Rhino and started fresh to avoid the Esc possibility. 

-Kit

Kit,

If the component that gave you the error is not the Microclimate Map component, then it is a different issue that is triggering the same error and you should open another discussion.  In any case, it's difficult for me to help without a GH file that replicates the error on my system so please include one in future posts if possible.

-Chris
